Key Match Events: LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 21 points, 13 assists, and 12 rebounds
Anthony Davis had 31 points, nine rebounds, and four blocks
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James' performance was praised by various commentators
The 76ers fell to 1-7 with the loss
Joel Embiid and Tyrese Maxey were absent for the 76ers
Paul George had an abysmal shooting game with just nine points on 4-of-13 shooting
